data.message: R.I.P Marshall Mathers- biggest wannabee ever now I'm making him gone forever, when it comes down to shit he's really not clever so it's nevermind whatever, Bitch tried taking my life and my light up his butt, that's why he says "will the real slim shady please stand up?" Still didn't want to meet up, it's like what the fuck? he honestly just sucks, what he had he took from me like a cluck,  here comes the dump truck, too much we've fought now bacteria's in his brain taking over his thoughts, in hell he rots, and I'm walkin that dog with it's head chopped off..
